ISSUE.TITLE: Needs `--public` flag even when configuration has "public": true
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: In my configuration file, I have `"public": true` defined. However, now-cli still errors to confirm if I want to deploy publicly as I am on the OSS plan. IMO, defaulting to the configured option seems like a better way of handling this.
